about.mission: To build practical AI solutions that help teams research, write, code, and ship faster, while delivering real-time monitoring for spacecraft and critical infrastructure.

whatWeBuild.title: Eli-S1 AI Engine
whatWeBuild.description: Multi-agent workflows that plan, code, test, and deploy with full audit trails. Eli-S1 doesn't just answer questions—it breaks down problems, spins up specialized agents, uses tools safely, and delivers reports you can trust.
features: Research and synthesis with source citations
Code scaffolding for multiple tech stacks

whatWeBuild.title: Structural Health Monitoring
whatWeBuild.description: Real-time health monitoring for spacecraft and critical infrastructure using fiber-optic sensors, edge analytics, and AI-driven anomaly detection.

whatWeBuild.title: Production Software
whatWeBuild.description: Enterprise applications available as SaaS or one-time licenses. From practice management to inventory systems, we deliver software you can run tomorrow.
features: AI chatbots for support and sales

eliS1.overview: Eli-S1 is our in-house AI engine designed for practical, enterprise-grade workflows. Unlike simple chatbots, Eli-S1 orchestrates multiple specialized agents to handle complex, multi-step tasks with full auditability and compliance controls.

howItWorks.title: Problem Analysis
howItWorks.description: Eli-S1 breaks down complex requirements into manageable tasks and identifies the best approach.

howItWorks.title: Agent Orchestration
howItWorks.description: Specialized agents are deployed for research, coding, testing, and validation tasks.

howItWorks.title: Tool Integration
howItWorks.description: Agents safely interact with APIs, databases, cloud services, and development tools.

howItWorks.title: Quality Control
howItWorks.description: All outputs are validated, tested, and documented before delivery.

howItWorks.title: Audit Trail
howItWorks.description: Complete logs of decisions, sources, and actions for compliance and debugging.

deploymentOptions.name: VPC Hosted
deploymentOptions.description: Deployed in your existing cloud infrastructure

deploymentOptions.name: On-Premises
deploymentOptions.description: Complete air-gapped deployment for maximum security

shm.overview: Our Structural Health Monitoring system provides real-time insights into the condition of critical infrastructure and spacecraft. Using advanced sensor networks and AI-driven analytics, we detect problems before they become failures.

sensors.description: Early crack detection and material failure prediction

analytics.name: Baseline Tracking
analytics.description: Establish normal operating conditions and detect deviations

analytics.name: Modal Analysis
analytics.description: Identify changes in structural natural frequencies and damping

analytics.name: Anomaly Detection
analytics.description: AI-powered identification of unusual patterns and potential failures

analytics.name: Predictive Modeling
analytics.description: Forecast remaining useful life and maintenance schedules

analytics.name: Impact Localization
analytics.description: Pinpoint location and severity of impacts or damage

spacecraftFocus: Launch and ascent load profiling with automated post-event reports
On-orbit thermal cycling stress maps and fatigue analysis
Micrometeoroid and debris impact detection with energy estimation
Panel delamination detection through acoustic and modal analysis
Thruster firing impact assessment on structural integrity
Solar panel deployment and articulation health monitoring
civilFocus: Bridge span monitoring with traffic load correlation
High-rise building wind response and seismic activity tracking
Dam structural integrity and hydrostatic pressure monitoring
Tunnel convergence and ground movement detection
Stadium and arena dynamic response during events
Historical building preservation and restoration monitoring

dataFlow: Sensors → Edge Processing → Cloud Analytics → Dashboard Alerts
Real-time streaming with 1-10 Hz sampling rates
Cloud ML models update every 24 hours
architecture.alerts: Configurable thresholds with SMS, email, and API webhooks
architecture.integration: REST APIs for SCADA, CMMS, and building management systems

kpis: Mean Time to Detection (MTTD): < 5 minutes for critical events
False Positive Rate: < 2% for high-priority alerts
System Uptime: 99.9% availability with redundant monitoring
Data Accuracy: ±0.1% for strain measurements, ±0.5°C for temperature

itServices.overview: We deliver production-ready software solutions with modern architectures, from rapid prototypes to enterprise-scale applications. Our team handles the full development lifecycle with DevOps best practices.

services.description: Full-stack applications using React, Node.js, Python, and mobile frameworks
Custom AI solutions for customer support, sales, and internal automation
Business management software for operations, finance, and customer relationships
Data processing, transformation, and business intelligence solutions
Infrastructure deployment, monitoring, and maintenance on major cloud platforms

deliveryModel.approach: Agile development with 2-week sprints and continuous delivery
deliveryModel.timeline: Most projects delivered in 3-6 months from requirements to production
deliveryModel.support: 6 months of included support, then optional maintenance contracts
deliveryModel.quality: Automated testing, code review, and security scanning on all projects

pricing.consultation: Free initial assessment and project scoping
pricing.development: $150-250/hour depending on complexity and team size
pricing.fixedPrice: Available for well-defined projects with clear requirements
pricing.retainer: Monthly retainer for ongoing development and maintenance

faqs.question: How does Eli-S1 differ from other AI tools?
faqs.answer: Eli-S1 is designed for enterprise workflows with multi-agent orchestration, full audit trails, and compliance controls. Unlike simple chatbots, it can handle complex, multi-step projects with specialized agents for different tasks.

faqs.question: What types of structures can your SHM system monitor?
faqs.answer: Our system is designed for both spacecraft and civil infrastructure including bridges, buildings, dams, tunnels, and pressure vessels. We customize sensor configurations based on specific structural requirements.

faqs.question: Do you provide source code with your applications?
faqs.answer: Yes, all one-time license applications include full source code. SaaS applications are hosted and managed by us, but we can provide source code under enterprise agreements.

faqs.question: What kind of support do you offer?
faqs.answer: We provide comprehensive support including initial setup, training, ongoing maintenance, and feature development. Support levels vary by product and licensing model.

faqs.question: Can your systems integrate with existing infrastructure?
faqs.answer: Yes, all our solutions are designed with integration in mind. We provide REST APIs, webhooks, and can develop custom integrations for enterprise clients.

primary.description: See our solutions in action with a personalized demonstration
